extraDescription: The resource shall provide schedule management support to EI Transformation initiatives as directed by the EI-PMO. - Provide planning advice and support to the EI-PMO assigned lead and project leads by consulting and coordinating with relevant project team members to ensure compliance to good scheduling practices and EI PMO standards. - Meet with schedule stakeholders to gather their input and validate schedules. Obtain information to complete resource allocation, work analysis, identifying gaps, conflicts, and inter-dependency issues such that a complete and logical work plan is developed.
